title: India Tech Summit 2024
description: Join India's leading technology summit featuring AI, blockchain, and startup innovations. Network with tech leaders from Silicon Valley of India and discover emerging technologies shaping the digital landscape.
location: Bangalore International Exhibition Centre, 10th Mile, Tumkur Road, Bangalore, Karnataka 560073

title: Carnatic Classical Music Festival
description: Experience the rich tradition of Carnatic music with renowned artists performing classical ragas. A celebration of South Indian classical music heritage featuring both veteran and emerging artists.
location: Music Academy, 168 TTK Road, Royapettah, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600014

title: Delhi Street Food Extravaganza
description: Taste authentic Delhi street food from famous vendors across the city. From Old Delhi's paranthas to Chandni Chowk's chaat, experience the best flavors of the capital with live cooking demonstrations.
location: Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium, Lodhi Road, New Delhi 110003

title: Mumbai International Marathon
description: Run through the heart of Maximum City! Full marathon, half marathon, and 10K categories available. The route covers iconic Mumbai landmarks from Gateway of India to Bandra-Worli Sea Link.
location: Gateway of India, Apollo Bandar, Colaba, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001

title: Contemporary Indian Art Exhibition
description: Showcase of contemporary Indian artists exploring modern themes through traditional and digital mediums. Features paintings, sculptures, and installations reflecting modern India's cultural evolution.
location: National Gallery of Modern Art, Sir Cowasji Jehangir Hall, 161-B MG Road, Fort, Mumbai 400023

title: Pune Startup Networking Meet
description: Connect with entrepreneurs, investors, and startup enthusiasts in India's emerging startup hub. Featuring successful founder stories, investor pitches, and collaborative networking sessions.
location: The Westin Pune Koregaon Park, 36/3-B, Koregaon Park Annexe, Pune, Maharashtra 411001

title: Beach Photography Workshop
description: Master the art of beach and coastal photography in beautiful Goa. Learn golden hour techniques, water photography, and portrait shooting against stunning backdrops. All equipment provided.
location: Anjuna Beach, Bardez, North Goa, Goa 403509

title: Bangalore Comedy Club Night
description: Laugh out loud with India's funniest stand-up comedians! Featuring headliner Kanan Gill and local comedy talent. Enjoy craft beer and snacks while laughing the night away.
location: Canvas Laugh Club, UB City Mall, 24 Vittal Mallya Road, Bangalore, Karnataka 560001

title: Himalayan Yoga Retreat
description: Experience authentic yoga in the Yoga Capital of the World. Morning sessions by the Ganges, meditation workshops, and traditional Ayurvedic meals. Perfect for beginners and advanced practitioners.
location: Parmarth Niketan Ashram, Swargashram, Rishikesh, Uttarakhand 249304

title: Bengali Literature Reading Session
description: Celebrate Bengali literature with readings from contemporary and classic works. Join authors, poets, and literature enthusiasts for an evening of storytelling and cultural discussions over traditional tea and snacks.
location: Oxford Bookstore, Park Street, Kolkata, West Bengal 700016

title: Classic Bollywood Film Festival
description: Relive the golden era of Bollywood with screenings of iconic films. Tonight features Mughal-E-Azam in its original glory, followed by discussions with film historians and critics.
location: Regal Cinema, Connaught Place, New Delhi 110001

title: Lakme Fashion Week
description: Witness India's premier fashion event showcasing the latest from top Indian designers. Featuring sustainable fashion, fusion wear, and traditional craftsmanship with modern aesthetics.
location: Jio World Convention Centre, BKC, Bandra East, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400051

title: India Gaming Championship
description: Watch India's top gamers compete in BGMI, Valorant, and FIFA tournaments. ₹10 lakh prize pool! Gaming gear exhibition, food stalls, and meet & greets with professional esports athletes.
location: HITEX Exhibition Centre, Izzat Nagar, Madhapur, Hyderabad, Telangana 500081

title: Education for All Charity Gala
description: Support rural education initiatives across India. Evening includes cultural performances, auction of artwork by underprivileged children, and dinner featuring regional cuisines. Formal Indian attire encouraged.
location: ITC Windsor, 25 Golf Course Road, Bangalore, Karnataka 560052

title: Rajasthan Cultural Heritage Festival
description: Experience the vibrant culture of Rajasthan with folk dances, puppet shows, camel rides, and traditional Rajasthani cuisine. Family event featuring local artisans, handicrafts, and live performances.
